subject: feat(timeline,detail): multi-date field selection and clickable connections
body:
Timeline view now supports selecting multiple date properties simultaneously
via a collapsible checkbox picker. Nodes appear at each date point where they
have a value, with a property-source badge when multiple fields are active.
This gives users a richer chronological view across different date dimensions.

Detail panel connections now render target node names as clickable buttons
that navigate to the connected node, enabling graph traversal directly from
the detail view without returning to the canvas.

Tags: timeline, detail-panel, navigation, multi-select, ui
Complexity: 3
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: timeline-enhancement
Semver: minor
